attributes.additional_details: We have 250,000 homeless and about 6000 of them are ex services, we are putting illegals before our own. Charity begins at home!
attributes.background: Refuse entry, stop the RNLI from helping them and use the navy to cause a blockade. They are being allowed in whilst we were on lockdown, the government have multiple times promised they would send them back and yet more are coming here.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579552
